Description:
About The RoleAs an adtech Presales Engineer, you will possess exceptional presentation, written and verbal skills. You will be familiar with adtech Security Product portfolio and have a technical understanding of the security use cases associated with the portfolio. You will have a deep understanding of security principles, architectures, and competitive products and security architectures and design.Job ResponsibilitiesYou will be responsible for a wide range of presales activities including:Product presentations and technical deep diving to prospects, customers and
partners
Conducting and documenting successful PoCs and live demos
Addressing RFI/RFP/RFQ responses accurately and in a timely manner
Keeping a trusted advisor relationship with key customers and partners, meeting
them regularly and keeping them up to date with the latest product releases and
new features
Opportunity analysis and support
Gathers and assesses customer needs, both business and technical.
Identifies related needs (lead generation, opportunity expansion).
Product presentations and technical sessions for prospects, customers and
partners
Addressing responses to customers’ requirements, RF(X)s
Design comprehensive security architectures based on customer requirements
Build and maintain a healthy, positive relationship with key customers and
partners, meeting them regularly, and keep them up to date with the latest
Product releases and new featuresSkills
Skills:
Bachelor degree in Computer/Telecommunication Engineer (e.g. computer
engineering/computer science).
4+ years’ experience as a security presales, architect, analyst, consultant in the
Information Security market
Robust knowledge of information security fundamentals, market analysis and
product verticals (architectural design, technology, implementation)
Excellent solution presentation skills
Applies broad understanding of technical innovations & trends to solving
customer business problems
Good knowledge of and relationship to the IT security market (vendor,

Existing experience skills with Juniper, Fortinet.
CISSP, CISM, CEH, or CCSK certifications
Knowledge with Networking Infrastructure solutions; switching, routing, wireless
...etc.
